comment.body:
@Alex-302  sorry sir, but after you added the rule https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/165908#event-10985195207, I now get pop up cookies like this
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/37255346/1e6d1fde-32f5-428a-8390-061073a4d0aa)

and also,
even though I tried to go to https://racingnews365.com/las-vegas-unpacks-for-grand-prix-kerbstones-in-local-atmosphere-as-well
but I was redirected to https://racingnews365.com/las-vegas-unpacks-for-grand-prix-kerbstones-in-local-atmosphere-as-well#allow-cookieconsent

it adds #allow-cookieconsent to the end of the link address

Oh yes, it still happens even though I have updated the filter, cleared the browser cache, and deleted the cookies previously saved on the website https://racingnews365.com

issue.title: Patreon likes/comment icons doesn't appear
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

2.0.94.3

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

patreon.com

### Ad Blocking

EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1 Patron's like and comment icons is not showing as shown below

2 After turning off ubo and went through a filters list on/off charade, I found the issue lies in Adguard social media filter

line in question patreon.com#?#div[data-tag="post-details"] div[class]:has(> div > button[data-tag="share-post-icon"])

3 Screenshots

filter off
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/8675162/bde516bb-280b-47f8-b377-15db59785c13)

filter on
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/8675162/28637f3a-4694-414a-a27a-ba91af556877)



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
